sql.query: select indate, seq_no, prcode,intime, (CASE option1 WHEN '3' THEN '납입주기' WHEN '5' THEN '변액보험펀드' WHEN 'A' THEN 'APL신청' WHEN 'D' THEN 'APL해지' END) as option1, (CASE option2 WHEN 'A' THEN 'APL' WHEN '' THEN '' END) as option2, isnull(policy_no,'') as policy_no, isnull(eff_date,'') as eff_date, (CASE nf_opt WHEN '4' THEN '신청' WHEN '9' THEN '해지' WHEN '' THEN '' END) as nf_opt, (CASE method WHEN 'D' THEN '자동이체' WHEN 'G' THEN '직접납부' WHEN 'F' THEN '지로' WHEN 'E' THEN '직접납부' WHEN '' THEN '' END) as method, (CASE mode WHEN '01' THEN '월납' WHEN '03' THEN '3월납' WHEN '06' THEN '6월납' WHEN '12' THEN '연납' WHEN '' THEN '' END) as mode, (CASE fund_type WHEN 'MS001' THEN '혼합형' WHEN 'BN001' THEN '채권형' WHEN 'MXU01' THEN '혼합형' WHEN 'MXU02' THEN '안정혼합형' WHEN '' THEN '' END) as fund_type, isnull(prdate,'') as prdate, isnull(prtime,'') as prtime, isnull(prname,'') as prname, nf_opt as nf_opt1 from cyber.dbo.CYBER_TBL_wb_method where indate = ? and seq_no = ? and prcode = ?
